definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="entity_remove_item"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">since blocks dont store nbt tags when exiting minecraft we must use items to assign information, this prevents the player from picking up the name item that drops from the BASE when destroyed</comment><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></next></block></xml>
